thread.title: Sanders to sit down with Ellen DeGeneres
thread.title_full: Sanders to sit down with Ellen DeGeneres - POLITICO

author: Nick Gass
title: Sanders to sit down with Ellen DeGeneres
text:
Fresh off the first Democratic debate next week, Bernie Sanders will sit down with Ellen DeGeneres on Oct. 15. It's the second time so far this cycle that a Democratic presidential candidate has appeared on "The Ellen DeGeneres Show." Rival Hillary Clinton appeared on the comedian's show during its season premiere week last month , learning the popular Whip and Nae Nae dance moves. Sanders, along with Clinton, Martin O'Malley, Jim Webb and Lincoln Chafee, will take part in the Oct. 13 Democratic primary debate at the Wynn Las Vegas.
Sanders also paid a visit to "The Late Show with Stephen Colbert" last month.
